name: Those Nights at Randys 2 (2019)
description:
Those Nights At Randy's 2- Tropical Games

14 Years after the café in 2006 a woman re-opens the establishment to the public as Randy's Pizza World. The new establishment contains some new friends! The toys are the new faces of the company & have a special place in children's hearts.

What's Included:
  • New mechanics
  • Second chapter of original story.
  • -Plushies Menu
  • -custom night advanced.
  • Aggressive learning A.Is (Randy only)
Current Story Line: The toy entertainers are built for safety & protection for staff. They have glow in the dark eyes which make it easier to see them in a power outage. The characters have had no problems during the day besides their lip-sync being a bit off, other than that they've always been great.

Tropical Games 2019
